name: InactiveServices
documentation: Allows for the exploration of available services, which may be downloaded and activated.

functions.name: All
functions.documentation: Get a list of all available services.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.documentation: The platform (either 'osx' or 'win32') for which you would like to see available corelets.

functions.name: Describe
functions.documentation: Get a data structure describing the interface of a specified service.

parameters.name: version
parameters.documentation: The exact version of the service.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.documentation: The platform (either 'osx' or 'win32') for which you would like a service description.
